p: Histological analysis was done at the end of the treatment period. Both control and experimental rats were euthanized using carbon dioxide asphyxiation. The livers were collected from all groups, fixed in saline with 10% formalin, dehydrated in ethyl alcohol, rinsed in xylol, and mounted in molten paraplast at 58–62 °C. Five-micron sections were collected, stained with haematoxylin & eosin (H&E), and evaluated for any structural changes under a bright-field microscope (El-Sayyad et al. 2009) with 10 × magnification.
